value.title: MediaTek Helio G95 chip announced for gaming smartphones
value.excerpt: MediaTek today announced its latest gaming-focused chipset, the Helio G95. An upgraded version of the G90T, the new chip is slightly faster in CPU and GPU benchmarks and comes with other new features.

value.title: Qualcomm Snapdragon 732G with improved CPU, GPU, and AI performance announced

value.title: China Is Gunning To Be The World Leader In AI Chips While Restricting Exports
value.excerpt: China has passed the US in AI chip patenting and their brightest star, Cambricon has more than four times as many patents as Nvidia.

value.title: Israeli chip maker Hailo to set up Tokyo unit as demand for AI tech grows
value.excerpt: Hailo, a maker of chips that allows edge devices like smart cameras or smart cars to have artificial intelligence capabilities, said it is setting up a wholly owned subsidiary in Tokyo, Japan. Edge devices are electronic devices that are installed at the edge of networks — the entry point to networks — in products such as autonomous vehicles,

value.title: Elon Musk unveils ‘Fitbit in your skull’ brain chip, demonstrates on pig
value.excerpt: Musk said this could eventually help cure people with conditions like memory loss, hearing loss, paralysis, blindness, brain damage, depression and anxiety.

value.title: Latest NVIDIA SHIELD Update Brings AI Upscaling Enhancements And New Features
value.excerpt: Over and above the excellent hardware, NVIDIA has been religious about consistently releasing updates for the SHIELD TV that only make what was already a great device even better.

value.title: This tiny AI chip obliterates Google rival in a crucial metric

value.title: Qualcomm-backed firm releases processor as AI chip race heats up
value.excerpt: Kneron Inc, a semiconductor startup backed by venture capital arms of Qualcomm Inc and Alibaba Group Holding Ltd, on Thursday announced a new chip aimed at handling artificial intelligence functions on battery-powered devices.

value.title: Kneron launches its new AI chip to challenge Google and others

value.title: ProteanTecs raises $45 million to apply AI to chip design and performance monitoring
value.excerpt: Startup ProteanTecs raised $45 million to further develop its AI chip design platform, bringing its total raised to nearly $100 million.

value.title: DDN Recognized for Innovation in Artificial Intelligence Data Management with 2020 AI Breakthrough Award

value.title: Baidu Is Searching For Quantum AI Advantage
value.excerpt: Baidu, China’s leading search engine and AI powerhouse, recently announced Paddle Quantum, a quantum machine learning development toolkit. This was the latest in a series of steps Baidu has taken to marry quantum computing with AI since establishing its Institute for Quantum Computing in 2018.

value.title: China Still Buying $300 Billion of Chips From U.S., Elsewhere
value.excerpt: China will import $300 billion of semiconductors for the third straight year, underscoring how the world’s No. 2 economy remains tied to America despite billions invested in local chip-making know-how.

value.title: SINTRONES Edge AI GPU Computing Solution enabling flexibility: EBOX-7000

value.title: SINTRONES Edge AI GPU Computing Solution enabling flexibility: EBOX-7000
value.excerpt: SINTRONES, one of the global leaders in computing technology in vehicles, announces the launch of the new EBOX-7000 Edge AI GPU Computing.

value.title: Edge AI Chips for Voice-Activated Devices Save Power, Protect Privacy
value.excerpt: Machine learning startup Syntiant announced in early August that it had secured $35 million to push its processors forward.

value.title: Microsoft Deploys AI ‘Supercomputing’ via Nvidia’s New Ampere A100 GPU
value.excerpt: Microsoft is ramping up a new set of AI instances for its customers. The new Nvidia Ampere-powered servers are powerful enough to qualify for supercomputer status, at least in some configurations.

value.title: Nvidia’s server business eclipses gaming chips for first time, though maybe not for long

value.title: Xilinx’s programmable AI chip powers safety sensors in Subaru car
value.excerpt: Xilinx said that its programmable AI chip has been used in the EyeSight safety system in the new Subaru Levorg vehicle.

value.title: World’s largest chip gets beefier: 850 thousand cores for AI
value.excerpt: Announed at the Hot Chips 2020 conference, the new chip — which is as large as a single 300-mm wafer — packs over two times more transistors as well as a whopping number of AI-optimized cores. The Cerebras Wafer Scale Engine Generation 2 has a die size of approximately 46,

value.title: Cerebras puts ‘world’s largest computer chip’ in Lassen supercomputer
value.excerpt: Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory said it has integrated Cerebras Systems' wafer-scale computer chip into its Lassen supercomputer.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Adds A100 GPU Instances for ‘Supercomputer-Class AI’ in the Cloud

value.title: Cerebras teases second-generation wafer-scale AI chip
value.excerpt: The existing Gen-1 has 18 gigabytes of DRAM on die. Lie told the audience to wait for details "in coming months." Cerebras competes with established GPU heavyweight Nvidia and other startups such as Graphcore and Tachyum.
